titleStmt.title: A psalme of thanks-giving to be sung by the children of Christs Hospitall, on Tuesday in the Easter Holy-dayes, at S. Maries Spittle, for their founders and benefactors. Anno Domini, 1641.
titleStmt.author: Christ's Hospital (London, England)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Richard Oulton, dwelling neere Christ-Church,

notesStmt.note: A variant: without engraved borders or patient counts.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
